Package com.Bit.microservice2mainService.request

Interface IExternalServiceRequest

public interface IExternalServiceRequest
This interface sends a request to the external service and receives a response, thanks to the call method of the retrofit.
Author:
Cem Kok

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    retrofit2.Call<com.google.gson.JsonElement> deleteCustomer​(java.lang.Long customerId)
    This method goes to the controller of the external service in the specified path and triggers the method in that path.
    retrofit2.Call<com.google.gson.JsonElement> findAllFilteredByCompanyName​(java.lang.String companyName)
    This method goes to the controller of the external service in the specified path and triggers the method in that path.
    retrofit2.Call<com.google.gson.JsonElement> getAllCustomers​(int pageNo, int pageSize)
    This method goes to the controller of the external service in the specified path and triggers the method in that path.
    retrofit2.Call<com.google.gson.JsonElement> getCustomerById​(java.lang.Long customerId)
    This method goes to the controller of the external service in the specified path and triggers the method in that path.
    retrofit2.Call<com.google.gson.JsonElement> getCustomerSortedDesc()
    This method goes to the controller of the external service in the specified path and triggers the method in that path.
    retrofit2.Call<com.google.gson.JsonElement> saveCustomer​(com.google.gson.JsonElement requestBody)
    This method goes to the controller of the external service in the specified path and triggers the method in that path.

  • Method Details

    • saveCustomer

      @POST("/api/customer/add") retrofit2.Call<com.google.gson.JsonElement> saveCustomer​(@Body com.google.gson.JsonElement requestBody)
      This method goes to the controller of the external service in the specified path and triggers the method in that path.
      Parameters:
      requestBody -
      Returns:
      JsonElement { returns the response from the external service}.

    • deleteCustomer

      @DELETE("/api/customer/deleteById/{customerId}") retrofit2.Call<com.google.gson.JsonElement> deleteCustomer​(@Path("customerId") java.lang.Long customerId)
      This method goes to the controller of the external service in the specified path and triggers the method in that path.
      Parameters:
      customerId -
      Returns:
      JsonElement { returns the response from the external service}

    • getAllCustomers

      @GET("/api/customer/getAllByPage/{pageNo}/{pageSize}") retrofit2.Call<com.google.gson.JsonElement> getAllCustomers​(@Path("pageNo") int pageNo, @Path("pageSize") int pageSize)
      This method goes to the controller of the external service in the specified path and triggers the method in that path.
      Parameters:
      pageNo -
      pageSize -
      Returns:
      JsonElement { returns the response from the external service}
